title: Talks Machina: Discussing C2E2 - A Show of Scrutiny
description: The adventures of Critical Role’s party, Vox Machina, are discussed and dissected with host Brian Wayne Foster on this show-after-the-show. The show also features cast member appearances, fan creations, questions and interactions--plus giveaways!
content:encoded: The adventures of Critical Role’s party, Vox Machina, are discussed and dissected with host Brian Wayne Foster on this show-after-the-show. The show also features cast member appearances, fan creations, questions and interactions--plus giveaways!
